sql-case.value: CREATE TABLE t_log (id int, status varchar(10))
CREATE TABLE C##t_log (id int primary key, status varchar(10))
CREATE TABLE departments_demo (id NUMBER(4) PRIMARY KEY DISABLE, name VARCHAR2(30) CONSTRAINT dept_name_nn NOT NULL, manager_id NUMBER(6), dn VARCHAR2(300))
CREATE GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLE t_log(id int, status varchar(10))
CREATE TABLE t_log (id int, status varchar(10), UNIQUE(id))
CREATE TABLE t_order_item (order_item_id int, order_id int, user_id int, FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES t_order (order_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)
CREATE TABLE t_log (id int, status varchar(10), INDEX(id, status))
CREATE TABLE t_log (id int PRIMARY KEY, status varchar(10), check(id > 10))
CREATE INDEX idx_id_status ON t_log (id, status)
